amendment.description: Amendment nominated Democratic candidates for Officers of the House.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a new list of nominations for House Officers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Menendez.
